usefulItems: cling wrap, square cake pan (8 in. x 8 in.), refrigerator
title: No Bake Coconut, Pecan, Date and Cranberry Bars

ingredients.content: 5 oz pitted dates, e.g. deglet noor

preparations.content: Line a square cake pan with cling wrap and set aside.
Place dates, cranberries and pecans into mixing bowl and grind <b>30 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add coconut, pumpkin seeds and salt and pulse <b>Turbo/1 sec/2 times<b>, then mix <b>3 sec/speed 2<b>.
Transfer to prepared cake pan, press firmly into base, cover with cling wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Cut into 15 bars, wrap individually in cling wrap and refrigerate until serving.

hintsAndTricks: Cut bars in rows of 5 x 3.
